# React Native Expo Go Project

This is a React Native Expo Go project with TypeScript support.

## Project Status

- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Get project setup info
- [x] Scaffold React Native Expo project
- [x] Install dependencies
- [x] Create README.md
- [x] Verify project compilation

## Project Overview

A React Native mobile application using Expo Go for rapid development and testing.

## Tech Stack

- React Native 0.81.5
- Expo SDK 54
- TypeScript 5.9
- React 19.1
- Watchman (file watcher)

## Development Guidelines

- Use TypeScript for all new files
- Follow React Native best practices
- Test on both iOS and Android when possible
- Use Expo Go app for quick testing
- Use `npm install --legacy-peer-deps` for package installations during React 19 migration
- Watchman is installed for efficient file watching
